text:
I'm not sure about "author page" you are talking about. but I can answer about displaying blog listing page using preview URLs.

First you need to visit your blog dashboard here
<https://app.HubSpot.com/blog/[PORTAL_ID]>

In the preview URL parameter, replace "content_group_id" value with content group ID of the specific blog listing from your HubSpot portal
<https://app.HubSpot.com/blog/[PORTAL_ID]/blogs/[BLOG_LISTING_ID]/manage/posts/all>
